database.name: VIEW SSFI_INVOICE_V
database.view: SELECT ci.c_invoice_id, ci.ad_org_id, ci.documentno AS factura, ci.poreference AS referencia, ci.description AS descripcion, ci.dateinvoiced AS fecha_factura, ci.dateacct AS fecha_contable, cd.c_doctype_id AS tipo_documento, ci.c_bpartner_id, cd.docbasetype, fps.amount AS total_factura, fps.paidamt AS cobrado_pagado, fps.outstandingamt AS pendiente, ci.posted, ci.issotrx AS tipo_transaccion, ci.c_costcenter_id, ci.user1_id, ci.em_scnr_invoice_id AS nota_cd, ci.em_sswh_withholdingref, ci.em_sswh_totalwithholdingincome, ci.em_sswh_totalwithholdingvat, cd.isreversal, fps.fin_payment_schedule_id, trunc(to_number((ci.dateinvoiced + cpt.netdays) - now()), 0) AS no_duedate, ci.c_currency_id FROM c_invoice ci JOIN fin_payment_schedule fps ON fps.c_invoice_id = ci.c_invoice_id JOIN c_doctype cd ON cd.c_doctype_id = ci.c_doctype_id JOIN c_paymentterm cpt ON cpt.c_paymentterm_id = ci.c_paymentterm_id WHERE ci.docstatus = 'CO'
